description.fr: Lorsque votre héros est soigné\_: <if pvm>Inflige {value:ParameterizedEffectExecution.918.perc,percent} de son {%AT} aux adversaires alignés à lui.</if><if pvp>Inflige {magicalDamage:ParameterizedEffectExecution.918.pvp} à l'adversaire ayant le plus de {%PV,plural:other}.</if>
description.en: When your hero is healed: <if pvm>Inflicts {value:ParameterizedEffectExecution.918.perc,percent} of their {%AT} on the opponents in line with them.</if><if pvp>Does {magicalDamage:ParameterizedEffectExecution.918.pvp} to the opponent with the most {%PV,plural:other}.</if>
description.es: Cuando tu héroe es curado: <if pvm>Inflige un {value:ParameterizedEffectExecution.918.perc,percent} de su {%AT} a los adversarios alineados con él.</if><if pvp>Inflige {magicalDamage:ParameterizedEffectExecution.918.pvp} al adversario que tenga más {%PV,plural:other}.</if>
description.de: Wenn dein Held geheilt wird: <if pvm>Verursacht {value:ParameterizedEffectExecution.918.perc,percent} seines {%AT,plural:two} bei Gegnern in derselben Reihe als Schaden.</if><if pvp>Verursacht {magicalDamage:ParameterizedEffectExecution.918.pvp} beim Gegner mit den meisten {%PV,plural:other}.</if>
description.pt: Quando seu herói é curado: <if pvm>Inflige {value:ParameterizedEffectExecution.918.perc,percent} de seu {%AT} aos adversários alinhados com ele.</if><if pvp>Inflige {magicalDamage:ParameterizedEffectExecution.918.pvp} ao adversário que tiver mais {%PV,plural:other}.</if>

gameplayDescription.fr:
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>\_: Votre force brute\_! Plus vous l'améliorerez, plus vous taperez fort\_!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>SOINS</color>\_: L'art de la guérison n'a aucun secret pour vous. Il y a toujours un moyen de soigner vos blessures\_!
gameplayDescription.en:
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>: Your raw strength! The more you improve it, the harder you'll hit!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>HEALS</color>: The art of healing has no secrets for you. There's always a way to heal your injuries!
gameplayDescription.es:
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>: ¡Tu fuerza bruta! Cuanto más lo mejores, ¡más fuerte golpearás!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>CURAS</color>: El arte de curar no tiene secretos para ti. ¡Siempre hay un modo de sanar tus heridas!
gameplayDescription.de:
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT,plural:one}</color>: Deine rohe Kraft! Je mehr du sie verbesserst, desto härter schlägst du zu!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>HEILUNG</color>: Die Heilkunst birgt für dich keine Geheimnisse. Es gibt immer ein Mittel, deine Verletzungen zu heilen!
gameplayDescription.pt:
<color=#7FD5E4>{%AT}</color>: Sua força bruta! Quanto mais você aprimorá-lo, mais fortes serão os seus golpes!
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>CURAS</color>: Você é especialista na arte da cura. Sempre há uma maneira de curar seus ferimentos!
